reviews.text: Worst station Ive ever had the misfortune to use. Of the signs that work most have conflicting times/info. Staff attitude is awful and the experience is made worse by northern fail!!!

Information screens down asked ticket office guy which platform the next train to lime St departs from  - platform 1 he told me and the 8 people before me. As we sit here like a lemon  the train has just departed from platform 2. When challenged he shrugged and said so what! Fuming at his rudeness.this is not the first complaint on here about staff rbad attitude - when will Merseyrail respond?
Very confusing platform layout. Radio information were super quiet, unable to hear updates regarding change of platforms.
Why do trains  call at this station if it calls at Roby. Walking Distance man. It’s a nice station though.
